com.meltingice.caman
Class Image

java.lang.Object
  com.meltingice.caman.Image

public class Image
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a single image. Abstracts over retrieving pixel data and loading images from files.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ryan LeFevre
